name: Teachers Insurance and Annuity Association of America
summary: Teachers Insurance and Annuity Association of America (TIAA) is a leading American financial services organization specializing in retirement services for employees in the academic, research, medical, cultural, and government sectors. Founded in 1918 through the philanthropy of Andrew Carnegie, TIAA operates as a private, nonprofit entity and manages over $1 trillion in assets, serving millions of clients across more than 15,000 institutions.
